languages.text: "По приказу Вольного Торговца были казнены как Скорбящий Сонм, так и мастер Прас. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархия{/g} выразила официальное порицание, поскольку убийство воинствующих праведников равнозначно пособничеству ереси. Новый же хормейстер в первый день службы потерял несколько важнейших сообщений, развязав тем самым войну между двумя мирами Простора Коронус. На данный момент один из них полностью уничтожен, а второй признан непригодным для жизни".

traits.locale_text: "По приказу Вольного Торговца были казнены как Скорбящий Сонм, так и мастер Прас. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархия{/g} выразила официальное порицание, поскольку изгнание воинствующих праведников равнозначно пособничеству ереси. Новый же хормейстер в первый день службы потерял несколько важнейших сообщений, развязав тем самым войну между двумя мирами Простора Коронус. На данный момент один из них полностью уничтожен, а второй признан непригодным для жизни".

languages.text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."
languages.original_text: "По приказу Вольного Торговца были казнены как Скорбящий Сонм, так и мастер Прас. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархия{/g} выразила официальное порицание, поскольку убийство воинствующих праведников равнозначно пособничеству ереси. traits.locale_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The Ecclesiarchy made an official statement of condemnation, as exiling militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

languages.text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurden sowohl der Traurige Gastgeber als auch Meister Pras hingerichtet. Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} hat den Vorgang offiziell verurteilt, denn die Tötung militanter Anhänger des Glaubens kommt der Beihilfe zur Ketzerei gleich. Zwischenzeitlich verlor der neue Chormeister am ersten Tag seines Dienstes mehrere Nachrichten von höchster Wichtigkeit, was einen Krieg zwischen zwei Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung auslöste. Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist eine dieser Welten komplett zerstört und die andere unbewohnbar geworden."
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurden sowohl der Traurige Gastgeber als auch Meister Pras hingerichtet. Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} hat den Vorgang offiziell verurteilt, denn die Tötung militanter Anhänger des Glaubens kommt der Beihilfe zur Ketzerei gleich. Zwischenzeitlich verlor der neue Chormeister am ersten Tag seines Dienstes mehrere Nachrichten von höchster Wichtigkeit, was einen Krieg zwischen zwei Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung auslöste. Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist eine dieser Welten komplett zerstört und die andere unbewohnbar geworden."

languages.text: « Sur les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, le Concile des Affligés et maître Pras ont été exécutés. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g} a officiellement déclaré leur condamnation. En effet, tuer des disciples de la foi revient à encourager l'hérésie. Pendant ce temps, lors de son premier jour, le nouveau maître de chœur a perdu plusieurs messages de la plus haute importance, déclenchant une guerre entre deux mondes des Étendues de Koronus. L'un de ces mondes a été complètement détruit, et l'autre est considéré comme inhabitable. »
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: « Sur les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, le Concile des Affligés et maître Pras ont été exécutés. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g} a officiellement déclaré leur condamnation. En effet, tuer des disciples de la foi revient à encourager l'hérésie. Pendant ce temps, lors de son premier jour, le nouveau maître de chœur a perdu plusieurs messages de la plus haute importance, déclenchant une guerre entre deux mondes des Étendues de Koronus. L'un de ces mondes a été complètement détruit, et l'autre est considéré comme inhabitable. »

languages.text: “在行商浪人的命令下，阴沉之主与普拉斯大师都遭到了处决。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}对此发表了官方谴责声明，强调杀害义勇军信徒的行为无异于助长异端恶行。与此同时，达戈努斯的新任唱诗大师上任当天，遗失了几条至关重要的信息，这导致科罗努斯扩区的两个世界爆发了战争。目前，其中一个世界已经被彻底摧毁，而另一个世界已经不再适合居住。”
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: “在行商浪人的命令下，阴沉之主与普拉斯大师都遭到了处决。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教教会{/g}对此发表了官方谴责声明，强调杀害义勇军信徒的行为无异于助长异端恶行。与此同时，达戈努斯的新任唱诗大师上任当天，遗失了几条至关重要的信息，这导致科罗努斯扩区的两个世界爆发了战争。目前，其中一个世界已经被彻底摧毁，而另一个世界已经不再适合居住。”
“在行商浪人的命令下，阴沉之主与普拉斯大师都遭到了处决。国教教会对此发表了官方谴责声明，强调流放义勇军信徒的行为无异于助长异端恶行。与此同时，达戈努斯的新任唱诗大师上任当天，遗失了几条至关重要的信息，这导致科罗努斯扩区的两个世界爆发了战争。目前，其中一个世界已经被彻底摧毁，而另一个世界已经不再适合居住。”

languages.text: «Por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, tanto la Hueste Dolosa como el maestro Pras fueron ejecutados. La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g} ha emitido una declaración oficial de condena, pues matar a militantes devotos de la fe es complicidad con la herejía. Mientras tanto, el nuevo maestro del Coro perdió varios mensajes de extrema importancia en su primer día de servicio, lo que provocó una guerra entre dos mundos de la Extensión de Koronus. A día de hoy, uno de esos mundos está destruido por completo, mientras que el otro se ha declarado inhabitable».
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: «Por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, tanto la Hueste Dolosa como el maestro Pras fueron ejecutados. La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g} ha emitido una declaración oficial de condena, pues matar a militantes devotos de la fe es complicidad con la herejía. Mientras tanto, el nuevo maestro del Coro perdió varios mensajes de extrema importancia en su primer día de servicio, lo que provocó una guerra entre dos mundos de la Extensión de Koronus. A día de hoy, uno de esos mundos está destruido por completo, mientras que el otro se ha declarado inhabitable».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの命令により、ドールフル・ホストとマスター・プラスは処刑されました。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}は、信仰の熱心な信者を殺害することは異端を助長することに等しいとして、公式に非難声明を出しました。一方、新任のクワイアーマスターは初勤務日に極めて重要な複数のメッセージを紛失し、その結果、コロヌス・エクスパンスの二つの惑星の間で戦争が勃発しました。現在、惑星の一つは完全に破壊され、もう一方は居住不能とされています」
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの命令により、ドールフル・ホストとマスター・プラスは処刑されました。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}は、信仰の熱心な信者を殺害することは異端を助長することに等しいとして、公式に非難声明を出しました。一方、新任のクワイアーマスターは初勤務日に極めて重要な複数のメッセージを紛失し、その結果、コロヌス・エクスパンスの二つの惑星の間で戦争が勃発しました。現在、惑星の一つは完全に破壊され、もう一方は居住不能とされています」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in emriyle hem Konakçı hem de Üstat Pras infaz edildi. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g}, inancın militan zahitleri öldürmenin kâfirliği teşvik ettiğini belirterek resmî bir kınama yayımladı. Öte yandan yeni atanan Koro Şefi, daha ilk gününde son derece önemli birkaç mesajı kaybetti ve bu, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki iki dünya arasında savaşa yol açtı. Şu an itibarıyla bu dünyalardan biri tamamen yok oldu, diğeri ise yaşanamaz hâle geldi."
languages.original_text: "On the Rogue Trader's orders, both the Doleful Host and Master Pras were executed. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} made an official statement of condemnation, as killing militant devotees of the faith is tantamount to abetting heresy. Meanwhile the new Choirmaster lost several messages of utmost importance on his very first day of service, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in emriyle, hem Konakçı hem de Üstat Pras infaz edildi. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g}, inancın militan zahitleri öldürmenin sapkınlığı teşvik ettiğini belirterek resmî bir kınama yayımladı. Öte yandan yeni atanan Koro Şefi, daha ilk gününde son derece önemli birkaç mesajı kaybetti ve bu, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki iki dünya arasında savaşa yol açtı. Şu an itibarıyla bu dünyalardan biri tamamen yok oldu, diğeri ise yaşanamaz hâle geldi."
